title: OCE Uni Championship - Newcastle Uni Jungle/Support

embed.description: Uni break is ending and spring semester is rapidly approaching, but the Oceanic University Championship might give you a reason to look forward to class! Following on from the Oceanic Collegiate Championship, uni clubs and gaming communities from around Oceania are collaborating to bring another epic tournament to the university scene.

body:
Hey guys, just trying to find one more player, at this moment i believe we mainly need a jungler but we would love a full team in general so not gona be picky lol (We could always do with more for subs if your interested) to be able to take part in the Uni Championship event Riot is hosting. My team we are building is from newcastle uni in NSW. 

If anyone is interested AND enrolled AT newcastle uni this semester, it doesn't need to Callaghan campus, can be any of them, just needs to be The University of Newcastle, hit me up, or message me here, add me in game, etc etc.

Cheers guys.

replies.body:
Hey guys, so nice to see OCE's Summoners being ambitious.
If you're ready for a challenge, head over to [veileague.wordpress.com](http://veileague.wordpress.com) for a chance to test your skills and win $300.
